summary: 计算机体系结构学习记录
title: Computer Architecture

content:
Environment # Mac OS Clang CLion Tasks # 实验要求
实现一个支持COW并发的字典树， 作业链接
Preparation # 拉取代码 cmu-db/bustub The BusTub Relational Database Management System (Educational) C++ 3145 1558 设置环境，这里运行的是mac的命令 build_support/packages.sh 编译 mkdir build cd build cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. make # 多线程编译 make -j`nproc` Experiment records # 记录实验中遇到的问题以及实现思路
实验内容比较简单，主要是熟悉一下C++，毕竟好久没写了，记录一下可能需要复习的点
unique_ptr dynamic_cast reset Run Tests # cd build make starter_trie_test ./test/starter_trie_test Format Code # 格式化代码
cd build make format make check-lint make check-clang-tidy-p0 Memory Leaks # 检查内存泄露
valgrind \ --error-exitcode=1 \ --leak-check=full \ ./test/starter_trie_test Submission # 提交打包文件上传的gradescope
zip project0-submission.zip \ src/include/primer/p0_trie.h Solutions # Reference # Mac下编译测试失败issue, (MacOSX13.3.sdk)
/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.3.sdk/usr/include/c++/v1/__random/uniform_int_distribution.h:162:5: error: static_assert failed due to requirement '__libcpp_random_is_valid_inttype<char>::value' "IntType must be a supported integer type" static_assert(__libcpp_random_is_valid_inttype<_IntType>::value, "IntType must be a supported integer type"); ^ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ /Users/dman/Documents/DatabaseTutorial/test/primer/starter_trie_test.cpp:29:39: note: in instantiation of template class 'std::uniform_int_distribution<char>' requested here std::uniform_int_distribution<char> char_dist('A', 'z'); ^ 参考Issue：https://github.com/cmu-db/bustub/issues/585
修改/test/primer/starter_trie_test.cpp:13
std::uniform_int_distribution<char> char_dist('A', 'z'); -> std::uniform_int_distribution<int> char_dist('A', 'z');
